channel.title: I guess people seem to fall for stupid, sappy stories
channel.description:
Lyk, WTF. Kid smokes pot and his dad sells Guitar Hero 3 for Wii for $9,100.01USD?
http://cgi.ebay.com/Guitar-Hero-III-3-Legends-of-Rock-Wii-NEW-WITH-RECEIPT_W0QQitemZ200181539427QQihZ010QQcategoryZ62053QQssPageNameZWDVWQQrdZ1QQcmdZViewItem

item.title: I guess people seem to fall for stupid, sappy stories
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Like he said, many bids were created by fake accounts, so he’s probably not going to get the $9100.

Read full topic
item.source: I guess people seem to fall for stupid, sappy stories

item.title: I guess people seem to fall for stupid, sappy stories
item.dc:creator: @Schizzo Schizzo
item.description:
@Schizzo wrote:

Could you refrain from posting these stupid, spam topics? It’s seriously getting old. All they ever do is end up with 2 or 3 pages of stupid messages and get locked in a few days.

Read full topic
item.source: I guess people seem to fall for stupid, sappy stories
